2016020.name: Krasnaya Factory
2016020.description:
Humanity is at war!

The aliens try to invade us and conquer our land, the military needs weapons, ammo, and vehicles. A lot of them, this is your opportunity to stand out from the crowd.

Create factories, automate them, and develop new weapons. You will need to support the armed forces of our great union. The soviet union is now a thing of the past. Welcome to the Union of Sovereign States.

Stay ready, they are smart, they know our weaknesses, you will need to protect your factories from alien attacks, so always keep a part of your production to defend yourself.
2016020.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
